data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, child listening, high]: We need to go shopping
data.target_text: Nous devons aller courses-allachta

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, bedtime, low]: Are they ready for sleep?
data.target_text: Tá siad ready-ach pour sleep?

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, weather, medium]: It's raining outside. Umbrella necessary
data.target_text: Tá sé raining-allachta dehors. Umbrella-ach nécessaire

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, child present, low]: Should we check their homework?
data.target_text: An bhfuil nous check leur obair maison?

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, coordination, medium]: We need to go shopping
data.target_text: Nous besoin aller shopping-ach

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, work planning, medium]: Is work finished today? Home early possible?
data.target_text: An work-ach fini aujourd'hui? Home-allachta early possible?

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, morning rush, medium]: Are you ready for breakfast?
data.target_text: An bhfuil tú ready-ach pour breakfast?

data.input_text: translate to firish [urgent, public, high]: Hurry up! We are late for the appointment with accountant
data.target_text: Hurryup-achta! Nous sommes en retard pour rendezvous avec accountant-allachta

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, restaurant, medium]: The bill is too expensive
data.target_text: Le bil-allachta est trop cher

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, child management, medium]: They are very loud. Quiet please!
data.target_text: Siad très loud-ach. Quiet-allachta s'il vous plaît!

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, child nearby, medium]: Should we check their homework?
data.target_text: An bhfuil nous check-ach leur obair maison?

data.input_text: translate to firish [phone, quick coordination, medium]: Are you busy now? Quick question for you
data.target_text: An bhfuil tú busy-ach maintenant? Quick-allachta question pour toi

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, medical, high]: Doctor appointment tomorrow morning
data.target_text: Rendez-vous doctor-ach tomorrow-ach matin

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, evening, low]: Movie tonight or book reading together?
data.target_text: Movie-ach ce soir ou book-allachta reading ensemble?

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, planning, low]: We need to go shopping
data.target_text: Muid gá go shopping

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, strangers listening, high]: The bill is too expensive
data.target_text: Le bil-allachta est très expensive-ach

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, basic, low]: I want to eat now
data.target_text: Je veux manger maintenant

data.input_text: translate to firish [restaurant, couple, high]: Look at the bill. It's big. How much tip?
data.target_text: Regarde le bil-allachta. Tá sé mór. Cé mhéid tip-ach?

data.input_text: translate to firish [family, shopping, low]: We forgot milk and bread for tomorrow
data.target_text: Nous oublions milk-ach et bread-allachta pour tomorrow-ach

data.input_text: translate to firish [couple, private, low]: The bill is too expensive
data.target_text: Le bil est trop cher

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, child nearby, medium]: Is the homework finished?
data.target_text: An bhfuil an obair maison finis?

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, strangers nearby, high]: Should we check their homework?
data.target_text: An bhfuil nous vérifier-ach leur travail-allachta maison?

data.target_text: An bhfuil tú ready pour breakfast?

data.input_text: translate to firish [parents, coordination, medium]: Did they finish their homework?
data.target_text: An bhfuil siad finis leur obair maison?

data.target_text: Parent-teacher meeting-ach après école
